inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of chronic heart failure or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Admission to a general medical service
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to engage with touchscreen technology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a text-enabled cellular phone to receive the post-discharge text messages
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Not diagnosed of chronic heart failure or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Not admitted to a general medical service
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Not capable of using touchscreen technology
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 79 yo F with multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen admitted with complaints of worsening shortness of breath.
